headline: Norton Small Business Expands Protection with Dark Web and Social Media Threat Features
summary: Norton, a leader in Cyber Safety and part of Gen (NASDAQ: GEN), today announced the expansion of Norton Small Business with new Dark Web Monitoring and Social Media Monitoring features. These features help business owners better safeguard themselves from data breaches, account takeovers, scams, and other digital risks. By providing proactive monitoring and timely alerts for compromised business data and social media threats, Norton is empowering small businesses with the resilience and confidenc
